article.headline: American 57, Howard 53
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Andre Ingram had 16 points and American overcame poor shooting in the first half to beat Howard 57-53 on Monday night. Matej Cresnik scored 14 points, going 6-of-8 from the field and 2-of-3 from 3-point range for American (3-4). American was 9-of-29 in the first half, but warmed up after halftime, shooting 62 percent (13-for-21). Andres Rodriguez had nine assists for the Eagles. Seye Aluko had 15 points and 10 rebounds and Louis Ford added 13 points for the Bison (2-4), who shot just 39 percent for the game (19-for-49), including 3-of-17 from 3-point range.
